documentation.text:
@title A barebones motivator, that simply sends the amounts on the challenges to the speedrunner on reclaim.
 @author msicilia.eth

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(string memory => struct MotivatorBase.Challenge storage ref)
mapping(string memory => struct MotivatorBase.Challenge storage ref)
function (string memory,string memory,string memory,uint256) view external returns (bool)
